title: The history of Polexander in five bookes / done into English by VVilliam Browne, Gent. ...
author: Gomberville, M. Le Roy (Marin Le Roy), sieur de, 1600-1674.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Harper for Thomas Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop ...,
notes: Attributed to M. Le Roy, Sieur de Gomberville. Cf. BM.
In four parts, each divided into 5 books, except pt. 3 which is divided into three books.
Reproduction of original in Princeton University Library.
